desc: Marbite Towel Holders is a marble invention that bites or grips any towel so it won't fall on the floor anymore. Marbite is easy to use, and easy to install indoor/outdoor towel holder of all sizes and uses (bath towels, hand towels, face towels, dish cloths and more) It is available online for $14.99

layout.text: No more picking your bath towel, hand towel or tea towel up off the floor!
